[windows] stop

[short] stop

mkhomedir golden
mkhomedir
mksourcedir

# test change file mode
chmod 755 $HOME${/}.bashrc
chezmoi apply
cmpmod 644 $HOME/.bashrc

# test change executable file mode
chmod 644 $HOME/.binary
chezmoi apply
cmpmod 755 $HOME/.binary

# test change directory mode
chmod 755 $HOME/.ssh
chezmoi apply
cmpmod 700 $HOME/.ssh
